show.subtitle: Stories and news that affect us all
show.title: Leid Stories

title: Leid Stories
content:
The Two-Party System: The Lesser of Two Evils; The Evil of Two Lessers Has it not become abundantly clear that the... <!--more--> two-party system will continue to give us more of what we’ve been getting – having to choose between the lesser of two evils and the evil of two lessers?
In this protracted political stickup the people lose.
We’re mere hostages to these marauders, and they know that we’re either unwilling or way too scared to break free.
Yet, it’s our best and only option.
